q: He's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly,'' Eric Schmidt said.`` As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated,'' Eric Schmidt wrote. So Larry, Sergey and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter. At$ 8.44 billion, Google's fourth-quarter revenue jumped 26 percent from a year earlier. Profit climbed 29 percent to$ 2.54

The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to assume more of a behind-the-scenes role as much as Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Eric Schmidt , 55, will still be available to advise Page, 37, and Google's other founder, Sergey Brin ,

I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. stepping down as the company's chief executive. Company co-founder Larry Page will become CEO, effective April 4. At the same time, Google said that Page's co-founder Sergey Brin , will henceforth concentrated on strategic projects, in particular working on new products.
